verbose_text: Although blockade of either PD-1 or LAG3 separately had only a modest effect, the combined PD-1 and LAG3 blockade significantly increased in the frequency of Gzmb + cells in donor CD4 + T cells (XREF_FIG D; XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), supporting their role in restraining CD4 + CTL differentiation.
evidence: PD-1 and LAG3 blockade significantly increased in the frequency of Gzmb +  cells in donor CD4 +  T cells ( XREF_FIG D;  XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY ), supporting their role in restraining CD4 +  CTL differentiation
